whyLeap.heading: Why Hong Kong founders choose LEAP
whyLeap.subheading: More than just accounting â€“ we're your compliance partner who understands startups, speaks your language, and keeps your business on track from day one.

dedicatedCPA.title: Dedicated CPA advisor
dedicatedCPA.description: You get a named CPA who knows your business, not a rotating support inbox. Talk to someone who understands your cap table, cash flow, and plans â€“ and stays with you as you grow.

smartAccounting.title: Bespoke smart accounting
smartAccounting.description: Our cloud-based, proprietary smart accounting system captures your finances accurately and flags issues early, so there are no surprises at audit or tax time.

flexiblePricing.title: Flexible, fair pricing
flexiblePricing.description: Transparent benchmark pricing by revenue, plus bundles tailored to your stage, transaction volume, and complexity â€“ so you only pay for what you really need.

allInOne.title: All-in-one business solution
allInOne.description: From incorporation and company secretarial work to ongoing accounting, audit, and tax advisory, everything sits under one roof with one accountable partner.

howItWorks.heading: Four simple steps to compliant, investor-ready finances
howItWorks.subheading: From your first call to ongoing monthly support, we make compliance predictable and painless â€“ so you can stay focused on building your business.

step1.title: Understand your business
step1.description: We start with a short call to learn your business model, transaction volume, and goals â€“ so we can recommend the right bundle.

step2.title: Set up your LEAP stack
step2.description: We handle onboarding to our smart accounting system, gather initial documents, and align your compliance calendar for the year.

step3.title: Run your business, we handle the rest
step3.description: Each month we keep your books upâ€‘toâ€‘date, track deadlines, and answer questions, while you focus on customers and product.

step4.title: Review, refine, and grow
step4.description: We review your numbers with you, flag risks, and suggest improvements, so your finances stay investorâ€‘ and bankâ€‘ready.
